**Description**
Describe the bug in enough detail that it makes sense to us.

**Example**
A [minimal reproducible code example](https://stackoverflow.com/help/minimal-reproducible-example) where the bug happens.

**Expected behavior**
Describe what you expected to happen.

**Actual behavior**
Describe what actually happened. Be explicit enough that we can make sense of how your expectations were disappointed.

**Environment**

- OS: [e.g. Windows]
- Rust version: [e.g. 1.50.0]
- Project version: [e.g. 0.1.0]
- [A relevant dependency version, if needed]

**Additional context**
If there is other contextual info that will help us reproduce, and/or understand the bug, please provide it here.
